tha-ap362:0.3_0: He then enjoyed himself with the senior monks, who are offering of almsfood, and who sometimes doesn’t.
tha-ap362:2.2_0: and there is a great lake named Mahākappina.
tha-ap362:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap362:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap362:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kāsi.
tha-ap362:6.1_0: He is the tenth part of the senior monks.
tha-ap362:7.1_0: He is included in the charnel ground.
